channel.title: Pages on Elayne-Mike.com
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Elayne-Mike.com

item.title: Photo Gallery
item.description:
Here you’ll find a collection of our favorite moments —

from adventures we’ve taken to memories we’ve made along the way. We’ll add selected photos to this page as we get closer to the big day, so check back often!

item.title: Faqs
item.description:
Where is the wedding taking place?

Our ceremony and reception will both be held at The Loft at Sweetwater, located at 2554 Geryville Pike, Pennsburg, PA 18073.

Elayne & Mike

item.title: Gifts
item.description:
We’re just so excited to celebrate with you — that’s the best gift we could ask for!

That said, if you’d like to contribute to our Honeymoon, Vacation, or Race Fund, we’d be incredibly grateful. We’re saving for some exciting adventures ahead and every little bit helps fuel the journey.

item.title: Leave a Message
item.description:
We’d love to hear from you!

We’ve set up this space for you to share a little something with us — and with everyone else! Scroll down to read what friends and family have written, or add your own message to the mix.

item.title: Song Requests
item.description:
We’re putting together the ultimate playlist for our wedding reception — and we want your help!

Got a song that makes you want to dance, sing, or just feel the love? Send us 1 to 3 of your favorite tunes that you’d love to hear on the big night. If it fits the vibe, it might just make the cut!
